lines.text:
[reading paper from a fortune cookie]
I'm so old, my fortune is blank.
How old did you say she was?
I got 22-year-old pants!

[to Charlotte]
I was wondering if you and your father would like to come up stairs some time and have a cup of tea with me?

[laughing]
Oh, I don't know. You'll have to ask him. what do you think, 'dad'?
Uh... she's not my daughter
I'm sorry, I'm a little hard of hearing. Would you mind repeating that?

[louder]
Charlotte... is not... my daughter.

[giggling in a sensual tone]
He he he.
No wonder you look so tired.

[Eddie notices Joseph go through his discarded belongings on the street and confronts him]
Hey asshole, what the fuck are you doing?
I'm sorry, I didn't realize this was your lamp.
This is not my lamp. It WAS my lamp, now it's my trash. What, you think this is fuckin 'Goodwill' here?
Hey, Eddie... give him a break, will 'ya?

[to Frank]
Why don't you shut the fuck up, huh? Crawl up my ass a little further!
I'm sorry.

[Eddie shoves Joseph onto the sidewalk]
Get out of here!
[Joseph quickly walks away]
. Fucking old farts are taking all of my shit!
She was big. What I loved every inch of her. I would have liked a little more oral sex, though.
Howard...
Why are you whispering? Are you trying to tell me a woman who dances naked in front of a fire won't give you oral sex?
You have no sense of romance, Howard.
And you're a goddamn sissy.
You're a nice guy, Joseph.
You're drunk.
